tool_description: Anonymizes customer data that cannot be fully deleted due to retention requirements, removing personally identifiable information while preserving data utility for business purposes.

anonymization_method.description: Anonymization technique: generalization, suppression, perturbation, or pseudonymization

preserve_analytics.description: Whether to preserve data utility for analytics

error_messages: Invalid anonymization method: Use one of [generalization, suppression, perturbation, pseudonymization].
Anonymization failed: Unable to anonymize data while maintaining required utility levels.
Invalid k-anonymity level: Value must be between 2 and 100.
Data access denied: Insufficient permissions to access data for anonymization.
Utility preservation conflict: Cannot preserve analytics utility with current anonymization parameters.
usage: Provide customer_id, data_locations requiring anonymization, and appropriate anonymization_method. Configure preserve_analytics and k_anonymity_level based on business requirements. Returns anonymization results and verification.

anonymization_id.description: Unique identifier for this anonymization operation

anonymization_quality.description: Quality assessment: high, medium, or low

utility_preserved.description: Whether analytical utility was successfully preserved

verification_passed.description: Whether anonymization passed privacy verification tests
